00020 struct BlockCache
00021 {
00022   vector<char*> blocks;
00023   
00024   BlockCache(int size)
00025   { blocks.resize(size); }
00026   
00027   char* do_malloc(size_t size)
00028   {
00029     if(blocks.empty())
00030       return static_cast<char*>(malloc(size));
00031     else
00032     {
00033       char* ret = blocks.back();
00034       blocks.pop_back();
00035       return static_cast<char*>(realloc(ret, size));
00036     }
00037   }
00038   
00039   void do_free(char* ptr)
00040   {
00041     if(blocks.size() == blocks.capacity())
00042       free(ptr);
00043     else
00044       blocks.push_back(ptr);
00045   }
00046   
00047   ~BlockCache()
00048   { for(int i = 0; i < blocks.size(); ++i) free(blocks[i]); }
00049 };
